attributes.action: start the introduction of the policies of the party for the correction of past mistakes of the former leaders of the countries of England, Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The first items which our party would like to discuss are:

1.A higher tax rate on Jammie Dodgers

2.An annual giraffe race for all towns with a population of 10,000 or more

3.Legalisation of many lower class drugs

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
